extensionAttribute.displayName: ESET Endpoint Antivirus - Last In-depth Scan Date
extensionAttribute.description:
Written by Neil Martin - 2018-12-02
This Extension Attribute returns the date the last successful on demand In-depth Scan.
Returns no value if ESET Antivirus is not installed or an In-depth Scan has never been run.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
esets_daemon="/Applications/ESET Endpoint Antivirus.app/Contents/MacOS/esets_daemon"
if [[ -e "$esets_daemon" ]]; then esetfsdate=$("$esets_daemon" --status | grep LastFullScanDate | cut -d "=" -f 2 | sed -e 's/T/ /g') if [[ $esetfsdate = "" ]]; then echo "<result>""</result>" exit 0 else echo "<result>$esetfsdate</result>" exit 0 fi else echo "<result>""</result>" fi
exit 0
